text.div:
OMRSFhir2ImplementationGuide

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://fhir.openmrs.org/fhir/ImplementationGuide/openmrs

An Implementation Guide covering the OpenMRS FHIR2 module implementation of FHIR

name: OMRSFhir2ImplementationGuide
title: OpenMRS FHIR2 Implementation Guide
description: An Implementation Guide covering the OpenMRS FHIR2 module implementation of FHIR

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology

resource.name: OMRS Address
resource.description: Address profile specifies the geological location details

resource.name: OpenMRS condition
resource.description: A FHIR Condition as understood by OpenMRS

resource.name: Openmrs Encounter
resource.description: A FHIR Encounter as understood by OpenMRS

resource.name: OMRS Group
resource.description: A Group Resource is described as Cohort in Fhir2 OMRS

resource.name: OpenMRS Location
resource.description: An OpenMRS location

resource.name: OpenMRS Location Contact Point
resource.description: An OpenMRS Location Phone Number

resource.name: OpenMRS Medication Request
resource.description: A FHIR MedicationRequest as understood by OpenMRS

resource.name: OpenMRS Patient
resource.description: A FHIR Patient as understood by OpenMRS

resource.name: OpenMRS Patient Identifier
resource.description: Patient Identifers as understood by OpenMRS

resource.name: OpenMRS Person
resource.description: A FHIR Person as understood by OpenMRS

resource.name: Openmrs Practitioner
resource.description: A FHIR Practitioner as understood by OpenMRS

resource.name: OpenMRS AllergyIntolerance
resource.description: A FHIR Allergy as understood by OpenMRS

resource.name: OpenMRS Diagnostic Report
resource.description: DiagnosticReport resource created by a OpenMRS that representing results of diagnostic tests that are performed in a given clinical context.

resource.name: OpenMRS Observation
resource.description: Observation resource created by a OpenMRS that representing a result for an order submitted by an EMR System

resource.name: OpenMRS Service Request
resource.description: Service Request Resource is represents a request for some type of procedure or diagnostic test to be performed. When fulfilled, the results of this request are represented as a DiagnosticReport resource with associated Observation resources

resource.name: OpenMRS Task
resource.description: A Task resource represent an activity that is to be performed,and track the completion of said activity between an OpenMRS and a FHIR2

resource.name: Group descriptive extension
resource.description: Extension for group description

resource.name: OpenMRS Patient Identifier Location
resource.description: OpenMRS location for which this identifier is valid

resource.name: EncounterStatus
resource.description: Encounter  status ValueSet

resource.name: Location Status ValueSet
resource.description: Indicates whether the location is still in use.

resource.name: Medication Request Intent Vs
resource.description: Medication Request Intent ValueSet

resource.name: Medication Request Priority ValueSet
resource.description: Openmrs Medication Request Priority ValueSet

resource.name: OpenMRS Intent for Task
resource.description: The intent of the task, subset from https://www.hl7.org/FHIR/valueset-task-intent.html

resource.name: OpenMRS Status for Task
resource.description: The state of the task, subset from https://www.hl7.org/FHIR/valueset-task-status.html

resource.name: OpenMRS Diagnostic Report Status Flag
resource.description: The status of the diagnostic report, subset from https://www.hl7.org/fhir/valueset-diagnostic-report-status.html

resource.name: OpenMRS Order Code
resource.description: The code for the openmrs requested in the EMR.

resource.name: Encounter Type Code System
resource.description: Encounter Type Coding System

resource.description: OMRS Encounter Resource Example

resource.description: Example OMRS Allergy Intolerance

resource.name: Practitioner Example
resource.description: Practitioner Resource Example

resource.name: Openmrs DiagnosticReport
resource.description: Example OMRS DiagnosticReport Resource

resource.name: Search through condition endpoint by Practitioner family
resource.description: Searches for condition based on the Practitioner's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?requester:Practitioner.family={familyName}

resource.name: Search through condition endpoint by Practitioner given
resource.description: Searches for condition based on the Practitioner's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?requester:Practitioner.given={givenName}

resource.name: Search in Encounter endpoint basing on Encounter location address-city attribute
resource.description: Searches based on the address-city field for the Encounter record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?address-city={city}

resource.name: Search in Encounter endpoint basing on  Encounter location address-country attribute
resource.description: Searches based on the address-country field for the Encounter record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?address-country={country}

resource.name: Search in Encounter endpoint basing on Encounter location address-postalcode attribute
resource.description: Searches based on the address-postalcode field for the Encounter record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?address-postalcode={postalCode}

resource.name: Search in Encounter endpoint basing on Encounter location address-state attribute
resource.description: Searches based on the address-state field for the Encounter record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?address-state={state}

resource.name: Search through Encounter endpoint by the date when the encounter was created
resource.description: Searches for Encounter based on the encounter creation date eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?date={date}

resource.name: Search in Encounter endpoint basing on Encounter uuid  attribute
resource.description: Searches based on the Encounter uuid field for the Encounter record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}}/Encounter?_id={uuid}

resource.name: Search in Encounter endpoint basing on Encounter lastUpdated  attribute
resource.description: Searches based on the Encounter lastUpdated field for the Encounter record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?_lastUpdated={date}

resource.name: Search through Encounter endpoint based on location reference
resource.description: Searches for Encounter based on the location reference uuid eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?location={uuid}

resource.name: Search through Encounter endpoint by a given Practitioner
resource.description: Searches for Encounters by a given Practitioner Reference uuid eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?participant={PractitionerUuid}

resource.name: Search through Encounter endpoint by a given Practitioner
resource.description: Searches for Encounters by a given Practitioner eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?participant.identifier={identifier}

resource.name: Search through Encounter endpoint by the Practitioner's family name
resource.description: Searches for Encounters based on the Practitioner's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?participant.family={familyName}

resource.name: Search through Encounter endpoint by the Practitioner's given name
resource.description: Searches for Encounters based on the Practitioner's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?participant.given={givenName}

resource.name: Search through Encounter endpoint by the Practitioner's full or partial name
resource.description: Searches for Encounters based on the Practitioner's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?participant.name={name}

resource.name: Search through Encounter endpoint by a given patient
resource.description: Searches for Encounters by a given patient eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?patient={patientUuid}

resource.name: Search through Encounter endpoint by a given patient
resource.description: Searches for Encounters by a given patient eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?patient.identifier={identifier}

resource.name: Search through Encounter endpoint by the patient's family name
resource.description: Searches for Encounters based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?patient.family={familyName}

resource.name: Search through Encounter endpoint by the patient's given name
resource.description: Searches for Encounters based on the patient's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?patient.given={givenName}

resource.name: Search through Encounter endpoint by the patient's full or partial name
resource.description: Searches for Encounters based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?patient.name={name}

resource.name: Search through Encounter endpoint by subject uuid
resource.description: Searches for Encounter by a given subject eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?subject:Patient={patientUuid}

resource.name: Search through Encounter endpoint by subject family
resource.description: Searches for Encounter based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?subject:Patient.family={familyName}

resource.name: Search through Encounter endpoint by subject given
resource.description: Searches for Encounter based on the patient's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?subject:Patient.given={givenName}

resource.name: Search through Encounter endpoint by subject identifier
resource.description: Searches for Encounter by the patient identifier eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?subject:Patient.identifier={identifier}

resource.name: Search through Encounter endpoint by subject name
resource.description: Searches for Encounter based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?subject:Patient.name={name}

resource.name: Search through Encounter endpoint by encounter type
resource.description: Searches for Encounter based on encounter type field eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?type={encounterType}

resource.description: Example OMRS location

resource.name: Search through patient endpoint by the patient's location city
resource.description: Searches based on the patient's recorded city/village of address eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?address-city={city}

resource.name: Search through patient endpoint by the patient's location country
resource.description: Searches based on the patient's recorded country of address eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?address-country={country}

resource.name: Search through patient endpoint by the patient's location postal code
resource.description: Searches based on the patient's recorded postal code of address eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?address-postalcode={postalCode}

resource.name: Search through patient endpoint by the patient's location state
resource.description: Searches based on the patient's recorded state/province of addresseg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?address-state={state}

resource.name: Search through patient endpoint by the patient's birthdate attribute
resource.description: Searches based on the patient's birthdate eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?birthdate={date}

resource.name: Search through patient endpoint by the patient's death-date attribute
resource.description: Searches based on the death date of the patient (if any) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?death-date={date}

resource.name: Search through patient endpoint checking for those that passed on or still alive
resource.description: Searches based on whether a patient is marked as deceased. Acceptable values are true or false eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?deceased={boolean}

resource.name: Search through patient endpoint by the patient's gender attribute
resource.description: Searches based on the gender of the patient. Note that this value must be from the AdministrativeGender valueset eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?gender={gender}

resource.name: Search through patient endpoint by the patient's uuid
resource.description: Searches based on the exact UUID of the patient record eg} /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?_id={uuid}

resource.name: Search through patient endpoint basing on dateCreated or dateUpdated field of the patient record
resource.description: Searches based on the the dateCreated or dateUpdated field for the patient record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?_lastUpdated={date-range}

resource.name: Search through patient endpoint by the patient's full or partial name
resource.description: Searches for patient based on patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?name={name}

resource.name: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by Practitioner given
resource.description: Searches for serviceRequest based on the Practitioner's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?requester:Practitioner.given={givenName}

resource.name: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by Practitioner identifier
resource.description: Searches for serviceRequest by the Practitioner identifier eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?requester:Practitioner.identifier={identifier}

resource.name: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by Practitioner name
resource.description: Searches for serviceRequest based on the Practitioner's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?requester:Practitioner.name={name}

resource.name: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by subject uuid
resource.description: Searches for serviceRequest by a given subject eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?subject:Patient={patientUuid}

resource.name: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by subject family
resource.description: Searches for serviceRequest based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?subject:Patient.family={familyName}

resource.name: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by subject given
resource.description: Searches for serviceRequest based on the patient's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?subject:Patient.given={givenName}

resource.name: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by subject identifier
resource.description: Searches for serviceRequest by the patient identifier eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?subject:Patient.identifier={identifier}

resource.name: Search through serviceRequest endpoint by subject name
resource.description: Searches for serviceRequest based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?subject:Patient.name={name}
